title: ONE BEDROOM NORTH OLMSTED
app_fee: $50 per person for credit check, eviction check, criminal background check
posting_body: Rent:  $915 per month includes hot and cold water.
Beautiful park like setting and view.
Large  kitchen with  eat in area, many cabinets, refrigerator, range, dishwasher and disposal, central air unit, extended living dining area.
Laundry room with locker in same building.
Security door with intercom and electric door release.
Quiet scenic property, convenient to Metroparks, I-480 and Great Northern Mall
Application fee: $50 per person includes credit check, eviction check, and criminal background check, income verification
